channel.title: PK-Reality v1.0 Want Perfect Server? Join Now!
channel.description:
Currently working on website, webclient & currently waiting for vote page
Hosted by 7core vps 32gb ram NEVER OFFLINE !
Download link : http://www.mediafire.com/download/hv7gn23dj8kqq5q/Reality-Pk.rar
Please vote if you like for helping more vote more players
- Fast training, i will be adding Double xp weekend - Instant Switching - - Clue Scrolls - - Great Pkp Shop - - Shops with all the provisions needed for pking - - Achievement System (Pking and bosses, works like milestones) - - Killstreaks which give REWARDS and increased pk points - - Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! - - Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! - - perfect models and rotations for newer items - - Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers - - Daily 2 hours of double pkp (handled by time relative to the VPS) - - Non-Cheatable - - Bossing SPREAD around wilderness - - Slayer System with slayer shop - - great economy - Amazing pking - great server for clans - lots of bosses to battle - oldschool feel - enjoyable - great ep drops - perfect target system - vengeance - Full clan chat - Slayer Helm effect - Almost all skill working perfect ( for people love skilling :p )
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/661/578842.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/661/578842.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/903/24eadd.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/903/24eadd.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/673/361c07.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/673/361c07.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/540/979dc0.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/540/979dc0.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/661/67ae37.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/661/67ae37.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/537/616583.png/][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/537/616583.png[/img][/URL] ]More image coming soon !
